Kenturah Davis (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1984) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'oge a na-arụ ọrụ n'etiti Los Angeles, New Haven na Accra, Ghana.
Davis nwetara BA ya na Occidental College na MFA na Mahadum nka Yale.

Ọrụ Davis na-enyocha mmekọrịta dị n'etiti njirimara, asụsụ, na ịme akara ihe atụ. Davis na-arụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi site na eserese gaa na eserese gaa na ihe ọkpụkpụ gaa na arụmọrụ. Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta nke Walker Art Center.

N'afọ 2020, Davis na akara ejiji: Osei Duro rụkọrọ ọrụ. Los Angeles Metro nyere Davis ọrụ ịmepụta nnukwu ọrụ nke a ga-etinye na-adịgide adịgide na ebe a kapịrị ọnụ na okporo ígwè Crenshaw / LAX ọhụrụ.
